Nahasnya Unai Emery: Dikritik Saat Ozil Absen, Mainkan Ozil pun Dianggap Keliru
05 Nov 2019, 14:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Unai Emery tampaknya tidak akan pernah tenang selama masih ada Mesut Ozil dalam skuad Arsenal. Setiap keputusan Emery tentang Ozil selalu dianggap keliru, selalu berada dalam posisi sulit.
Beberapa bulan terakhir, Emery dikritik karena jarang memberikan kesempatan pada Ozil. Tanpa alasan jelas, Emery terus mengabaikan Ozil pada pertandingan-pertandingan penting. Ozil bahkan tidak masuk dalam skuad.
Terus tertekan, Emery akhirnya mengubah keputusan tersebut. Dia menurunkan Ozil pada dua laga terakhir Arsenal kontra Liverpool dan Wolverhampton. Anehnya, keputusan Emery ini pun dianggap salah.
Adalah Tony Cascarino, analis Premier League yang mengkritik Emery karena menurunkan Ozil. Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!

Unai Emery's Nahasnya: Criticized When Ozil Absent, Play Ozil was Considered False
05 Nov 2019, 14:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Unai Emery never seems to be calm as long as there is Mesut Ozil in the Arsenal squad. Every Emery's decision about Ozil was always considered wrong, always in a difficult position.
In the last few months, Emery has been criticized for rarely giving Ozil a chance. For no apparent reason, Emery continued to ignore Ozil in important matches. Ozil isn't even in the squad.
Continue to be depressed, Emery finally changed the decision. He fielded Ozil in the last two Arsenal matches against Liverpool and Wolverhampton. Strangely, Emery's decision was considered wrong.
It was Tony Cascarino, a Premier League analyst who criticized Emery for bringing down Ozil. Read below, Bolaneters!
